GSD.product_version: versions from v5.16 to before v6.0.3
GSD.description:
usb: gadget: uvc: Fix argument to sizeof() in uvc_register_video()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.3 by commit c63266f1da3574b83ddb67ea2c66bb9bce2c35d0, it was introduced in version v5.16 by commit e4ce9ed835bcaf4cd3230a53a79645986c25ce0f. For more details please see the references link.
